statements: ALTER TABLE predictive_analytics_table ADD COLUMN new_column VARCHAR(255)
ALTER TABLE predictive_analytics_table DROP COLUMN prediction
ALTER TABLE predictive_analytics_table MODIFY COLUMN customer_id BIGINT

ALTER TABLE customer_data
ADD COLUMN phone_number VARCHAR(15);

ALTER TABLE purchase_history
DROP COLUMN total_amount;

MODIFY COLUMN accuracy DECIMAL(8,2);

ALTER TABLE products MODIFY COLUMN price DECIMAL(12, 2);
